Name: Boss suit
Flavor: Show them who wears the pinstriped pants around here.
Effect: Reveal when challenged. Ignore the challenge and move on.

Name: Cat burglar outfit
Flavor: Always smart to dress like a criminal.
Effect: Reveal during your turn to steal a revealed card from another player. Keep it face-down. You may reveal it again in the future.

Name: Janitor's uniform
Effect: At the end of the game, reveal the cards in the Bathroom envelope. If it contains 0 mess cards, this is worth 5 points. Otherwise, it's worth 0 points.

Name: Lucky socks
Flavor: Luck is what happens when wealth meets nepotism.
Effect: Reveal when you are challenged, but they guess the wrong room. This card is then worth 5 points. If you are never incorrectly challenged, this card is worth 0 points.

Name: Parachute pants
Flavor: Looking great is its own reward.

Name: White linen suit
Flavor: Spotless, and soft to the touch. Quite dashing.
Effect: Reveal at the end of the game. If you have 0 face-up mess cards, this card is worth 5 points. Otherwise, it's worth 0 points.
